name: Dominic Cummings's Eyesight Test
description:
In March 2020, Dominic Cummings broke his own COVID-19 lockdown rules to go on a wee holiday to Durham. While he was there, he made an additional unnecessary journey to Barnard Castle. When questioned, he claimed he had made the 30-mile trip with his wife and child to test his eyesight.

What a brilliant idea! Let's all test our eyesight by driving!

Use the left and right arrow keys (or the letters A and D) to move your car around. Try to avoid hitting pedestrians (or don't, if they were important like you they'd be driving posh cars instead of walking).
